name: Frozen Assets
Lore: 'Molten carbonite is released into the chamber and then flash frozen, releasing a blast of air. The subject is instantly covered in the newly solidified material.',
Text: 'Deploy on your side of table. At every site where there is a ''frozen'' captive, your Rebels deploy -2 and are power +2 in battle. OR Deploy on top of opponent''s Force Pile. Force below this card may not be drawn or used. Effect lost at end of opponent''s next turn.',
